detaileddescription.para: Taskflow consists of a multidisciplinary team with different areas of expertise. We adhere to our Code of Conduct.

sect1.title: Core Members
sect1.para: Core members provide the essential development, maintenance, and support of Taskflow in all aspects.

listitem.para: Software Developers: Tsung-Wei Huang, Dian-Lun Lin, Cheng-Hsiang Chiu
Financial Manager: Aidza Cruz (aidza dot cruz at utah dot edu)
Ombudsperson: Jennifer Hoskins (jennifer dot hoskins at osp dot utah dot edu)
Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion: Tsung-Wei Huang

sect1.title: Alumni
sect1.para: Taskflow would not have reached this far without the work of these individuals who ever participated in its development.

sect1.title: Freelance Developers
sect1.para: Taskflow is contributed by a distributed set of Contributors all around the world.
